thread.title: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must copy Alexis Sanchez, says Martin Keown | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must copy Alexis Sanchez, says Martin Keown | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Mesut Ozil must copy Alexis Sanchez, says Martin Keown | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 11:20 am Mesut Ozil urged to do more work off the ball (Picture: Getty) 
Mesut Ozil could learn a thing or two from his Arsenal team-mate Alexis Sanchez on how to press without the ball, says former Gunners defender Martin Keown. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Germany international has had his critics lately after a slump in Arsenal’s form overall, with many feeling that the club’s record signing doesn’t offer enough work rate to the side. 
Keown has echoed that view, calling on the £42million playmaker to learn from Sanchez and help his team out with the dirty work when they’re up against it. Can Ozil replicate the work rate of Alexis Sanchez? (Picture: Getty) 
‘There is no question about what he (Ozil) can do with the ball but there are doubts over what his role is when Arsenal are out of possession,’ Keown told The Sun . 
‘Sanchez is the leading goal scorer in the Premier League but he presses so well and we’ve seen him do it for his national team.
